attribute.description: Centaur DQ to DIMM connector DQ mapping. Uint8 value for each Centaur DQ (0-79). The value is the corresponding DIMM Connector DQ. Therefore if (data[2] == 60) then Centaur DQ 2 maps to DIMM DQ 60 If the logical DIMM is on a Centaur-DIMM then the value is the same as the array index because there is no DIMM connector. If the logical DIMM is an IS-DIMM then the value depends on board wiring.
MBA Chiplet port this DIMM is connected to
MBA port DIMM number of this DIMM

Bad DQ bitmap from a Centaur:MBA point of view. The data is a 10 byte bitmap for each of 4 possible ranks. The bad DQ data is stored in DIMM SPD, it is stored in a special format and is translated to a DIMM Connector point of view for IS-DIMMs. All of these details are hidden from the user of this attribute.
